paras.description: I am a computer science student in the prestiges People's Education Socity University . I am the topper of the University and have recived the University Scholership consicatively for the forth time in a row.I am well worsed with the cericulem.
I am looking for an oppertuniy for doing internship and my field of spicialization is Data analities and Big Data , I am also intrested in Iot , Mashine learning and Artificial Inleligelce
